title: Can't submit a ticket for a ban I believe was unjust because upon entering riots site i'm signed out
body: How can I submit a ticket? I try but it says im not signed in, and clicking the sign in button does nothing. Won't go over my ban as thats not permitted according to the Etiquette but I'm starting to get triggered and am going to also ask reddit for help.

replies.body: The steps Riney provided might help in case of a [caching](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or browser issue.  You can also hit us up through email via support@riotgames.com.   We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

Try;

* Restarting your browser
* Clearing your cache ad trying again
* Updating your browser
* Using a different browser
